title: Issue 362
summary: MAUI and .NET 7 Preview already... where does the time go?

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #362 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of this week's Xamarin and DotNet MAUI community news and articles.

If you are brave you can now have a look at .NET MAUI in .NET 7 with Visual Studio 2022 Preview. Just be careful and don't update your only environment. Ask me how I know. ;-)

I hope you all have a great week ahead.
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #362 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of this week's Xamarin and DotNet MAUI community news and articles.

If you are brave you can now have a look at .NET MAUI in .NET 7 with Visual Studio 2022 Preview. Just be careful and don't update your only environment. Ask me how I know. ;-)

I hope you all have a great week ahead.

items.title: .NET MAUI in .NET 7 Release Candidate 1
items.description:
.NET MAUI is now part of .NET 7 in RC1 with tons of improvements, and a few new features.

.NET MAUI in .NET 7 Release Candidate 1 by David Ortinau
items.description_markdown:
.NET MAUI is now part of .NET 7 in RC1 with tons of improvements, and a few new features.

[**.NET MAUI in .NET 7 Release Candidate 1**](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/dotnet-maui-in-dotnet-7-rc1/) by [David Ortinau](https://twitter.com/davidortinau)

items.title: Figma to MAUI Graphics
items.description:
FigmaSharp.Maui.Graphics turns your Figma design into .NET MAUI Graphics code.

items.title: Enabling Users to Manage Subscriptions on iOS/Android
items.description:
Let's take a look at how easy it is to implement a Manage Subscriptions action on iOS/Android to adhere to the new guidelines.

items.title: Playing audio with .NET MAUI
items.description:
Many apps, whether mobile or desktop, require the ability to play audio. David Britch digs into using audio in your MAUI Apps

items.title: Telerik Reporting in .NET MAUI and .NET MAUI Blazor
items.description:
In this blog post, you will see how to display a Telerik Reporting report into a .NET MAUI and .NET MAUI Blazor app by using the HTML5 Report Viewer and the Blazor Report Viewer.

items.description_markdown:
In this blog post, you will see how to display a Telerik Reporting report into a .NET MAUI and .NET MAUI Blazor app by using the HTML5 Report Viewer and the Blazor Report Viewer.

[**Telerik Reporting in .NET MAUI and .NET MAUI Blazor**](https://www.telerik.com/blogs/telerik-reporting-conquers-dotnet-maui-blazor) by [Telerik](https://twitter.com/Telerik)

items.title: .NET MAUI in .NET 7 Fills In Xamarin Gaps
items.description:
With the new .NET MAUI in .NET 7 Release Candidate 1, the dev team has continued to polish things up ahead of a November GA debut while at the same time filling in gaps from its predecessor, Xamarin.

.NET MAUI in .NET 7 Fills In Xamarin Gaps by David Ramel
items.description_markdown:
With the new .NET MAUI in .NET 7 Release Candidate 1, the dev team has continued to polish things up ahead of a November GA debut while at the same time filling in gaps from its predecessor, Xamarin.

[**.NET MAUI in .NET 7 Fills In Xamarin Gaps**](https://visualstudiomagazine.com/articles/2022/09/22/net-maui-rc1.aspx) by [David Ramel](https://twitter.com/dramel)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI in .NET 7 Fills In Xamarin Gaps**

items.title: Change Status Bar Color for Android and iOS in .NET MAUI
items.description:
Are you having trouble changing the background color of the status bar in your .NET MAUI app? Watch this video! With the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit you now get the StatusBarBehavior which allows you to change the status bar color in your app very easily and even per page or dynamically!

Change Status Bar Color for Android and iOS in .NET MAUI by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Are you having trouble changing the background color of the status bar in your .NET MAUI app? Watch this video! With the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit you now get the StatusBarBehavior which allows you to change the status bar color in your app very easily and even per page or dynamically!

[**Change Status Bar Color for Android and iOS in .NET MAUI**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dWj0PdImH10) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **Change Status Bar Color for Android and iOS in .NET MAUI**

items.title: How to Install Multiple Versions of Xcode on Your Mac
items.description:
Xcodes is a glorious application that solves the age old problem of installing, managing, and settings default versions of Xcode. Sit back for this whirlwind tour of this amazing free tool that you NEED right now!

How to Install Multiple Versions of Xcode on Your Mac by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
Xcodes is a glorious application that solves the age old problem of installing, managing, and settings default versions of Xcode. Sit back for this whirlwind tour of this amazing free tool that you NEED right now!

[**How to Install Multiple Versions of Xcode on Your Mac**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=41h0xIKusT0) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **How to Install Multiple Versions of Xcode on Your Mac**

items.title: Create a .NET MAUI App By Clicking?! You Can With Grial Kit!
items.description:
Have you ever heard about Grial Kit? It's about time you did! This amazing product is loaded with ready to use templates for your .NET MAUI and Xamarin.Forms apps. In this video I will show you how you can click together your app in a web portal, download the code and start building... Prepare to be amazed!

Create a .NET MAUI App By Clicking?! You Can With Grial Kit! by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Have you ever heard about Grial Kit? It's about time you did! This amazing product is loaded with ready to use templates for your .NET MAUI and Xamarin.Forms apps. In this video I will show you how you can click together your app in a web portal, download the code and start building... Prepare to be amazed!

[**Create a .NET MAUI App By Clicking?! You Can With Grial Kit!**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cb4fLkxXFSg) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **Create a .NET MAUI App By Clicking?! You Can With Grial Kit!**

items.title: .NET MAUI & Blazor - Inspect the web UI
items.description:
Web developers are used to being able to use browser developer tools to inspect HTML, CSS, etc. In this video, Daniel will show you how to use that even in a -NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid app.

.NET MAUI & Blazor - Inspect the web UI by Daniel Hindrikes
items.description_markdown:
Web developers are used to being able to use browser developer tools to inspect HTML, CSS, etc. In this video, Daniel will show you how to use that even in a -NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid app.

[**.NET MAUI & Blazor - Inspect the web UI**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iIa0HhV1ZsY) by [Daniel Hindrikes](https://twitter.com/hindrikes)

items.title: Building your own custom controls
items.description:
In this video, Daniel walks through how to create your own reusable custom controls when using .NET MAUI.

Building your own custom controls by Daniel Hindrikes
items.description_markdown:
In this video, Daniel walks through how to create your own reusable custom controls when using .NET MAUI.

[**Building your own custom controls**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Cd3amJ-qcw) by [Daniel Hindrikes](https://twitter.com/hindrikes)

items.title: .NET MAUI CardViews & Circle Images with Borders, Shapes, and Shadows
items.description:
Let's use some new controls in .NET MAUI to make reusable CardViews out of Borders, Shapes, Geometry, and Shadows from scratch! Goodbye Frames, because we now have full control to build some beautiful UI. Oh, also why not make some circle images as well!

.NET MAUI CardViews & Circle Images with Borders, Shapes, and Shadows by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
Let's use some new controls in .NET MAUI to make reusable CardViews out of Borders, Shapes, Geometry, and Shadows from scratch! Goodbye Frames, because we now have full control to build some beautiful UI. Oh, also why not make some circle images as well!

[**.NET MAUI CardViews & Circle Images with Borders, Shapes, and Shadows**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-kyAeAGFVg) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI CardViews & Circle Images with Borders, Shapes, and Shadows**

items.title: Merge Conflict: 324: Revisiting GitHub Copilot
items.description:
It has been several months since we last talked about GitHub Copilot, the automated AI coding friend inside of Visual Studio & Visual Studio Code. Let's revisit and give our hands on thoughts of what we think of this new technology.

Merge Conflict: 324: Revisiting GitHub Copilot by Merge Conflict
items.description_markdown:
It has been several months since we last talked about GitHub Copilot, the automated AI coding friend inside of Visual Studio & Visual Studio Code. Let's revisit and give our hands on thoughts of what we think of this new technology.

[**Merge Conflict: 324: Revisiting GitHub Copilot**](https://www.mergeconflict.fm/324) by [Merge Conflict](https://twitter.com/mergeconflictfm)
